title: Raskulls
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Raskulls is a bone-shakingly crazy action platformer for Xbox Live Arcade! Embark on an action-packed adventure in the Raskulls Mega Quest, starring the lovable yet completely self-centred King, tough-but-fair Bonesaw and the unlikely hero Dragon. Save the world and unlock Achievements in the single player Mega Quest spanning three chapters and over 60 levels! Take your platforming prowess online around the world, or simply on the couch with friends in Raskulls Multiplayer! Raskulls is here to stay, so it's now your quest to jump, fall, swim and bash your way through every inch of the rich Raskulls world!

contentRating.label: E10 (Everyone 10+)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Mega Quest Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Join King, Ninja, Dragon and more as they meet the evil Pirats who have crash-landed on the Raskulls world to wreak havoc in the epic Mega Quest! This brand new HD trailer showcases both gameplay and cinematics as the cast of crazy characters go head-to-head in a massive variety of levels. This is the heart of Raskulls -  fast, crazy and action-packed platforming with a cheeky sense of humor!

childDownloads.title: Raskulls Premium Theme
childDownloads.description: Add fun and awesomeness to your Xbox 360 dashboard with the Raskulls Premium Theme! The cast of characters have gathered in an array of fantabulous situations for your very own viewological pleasure experience! With multiple high-resolution backgrounds and a snazzy new design for your Friends list, the Raskulls Premium Theme is the right ticket to spruce up your Xbox 360! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Raskulls Reinforcements 1
childDownloads.description: Raskulls is expanding in the first Reinforcements pack with the addition of four new playable characters and a new Grand Prix! Meet Spaceman, with a heart of gold and lust for adventure - Viking, whose pillaging tendencies have made him none too popular - Kitten, who never forgets to purr - and Barney, the lovable yet entirely incompetent henchman of the evil Turncoat.  Take your new Raskulls to race on 4 entirely new tracks that even take you inside King's castle! Download this pack and turn the heat up in your Grand Prix matches!

childDownloads.title: Raskulls Reinforcements 2
childDownloads.description: It's round two for Raskulls Reinforcements, with four new characters stepping up to race against the best. General Battlebones, proving that seniority means superiority - Robot, who is some twisted scientist's bizarre creation - Witchdoctor, with more curses that you can shake a voodoo doll at and Scurv, the final and dumbest of all the evil henchmen. Race over 4 awesome new tracks and brave through the storm!  Collect the final four characters to complete your full Raskulls roster!
